alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Madison Parish through 215 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a thunderstorm producing a landspout near Tallulah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Madison Parish. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
